Sixx:A.M.  -  Prayers for the Damned, Vol. 1  2016 320ak

Sixx:A.M. is a hard rock band from Los Angeles, California, formed in 2007 by Nikki Sixx, DJ Ashba, and James Michael, and is the side project of Sixx, who was also the bass guitarist for MÃ¶tley CrÃ¼e. The group is best known for their songs "Life Is Beautiful" and "Lies of the Beautiful People". The name Sixx:A.M. is a combination of all of the member's last names (Sixx, Ashba, Michael).

To date, Sixx:A.M. have released three studio albums; The Heroin Diaries Soundtrack (2007), This Is Gonna Hurt (2011) and Modern Vintage (2014), and three EP's; X-Mas In Hell (2008); Live Is Beautiful (2008) and 7 (2011).
